definition.en: An umbrella term for a group of complex disorders related to brain development.

scopeNote.en: (NCDJ) Opinions vary on how to refer to someone with autism. Some people with autism prefer being referred to as “autistic” or an “autistic person.” Others object to using autistic as an adjective. The Autism Self Advocacy Network details this debate.  NCDJ recommendation is to refer to someone as having autistic spectrum disorder only if the information is relevant to the story and you are confident there is a medical diagnosis. Ask individuals how they prefer to be described.
